For the most potato gamer, my opinion. I tried this using an Intel Atom x5-z8350 and it 2gb ram and it BARELY handled. But what I will give it is this. It was PLAYABLE. I upgraded recently to an Intel i5-4250u and noticed I have about double video memory with the integrated graphics. It rides so smooth it's rediculous on those average lower settings. It's the perfect game for budget builds and I think that's why everyone should be able to play it. This game is a masterpiece and we may be getting a THIRD ONE soon.

Half-Life 2 is a classic for a good reason. The story is incredible. The game-play is terrific. The music is kick-ass. It's optimized to work on almost any PC, and will look great on an advanced one. You'll want to play through it several times, so long as you own it.

Ajudar um grupo rebelde a expulsar um império interdimensional, que estabeleceu uma ditadura global no planeta, usando um pé-de-cabra e um manipulador de campo de energia em ponto zero (manipula objetos usando gravidade) enquanto uma horda de zumbis se espalha pelos cantos e um monte de insetos gigantes que copulam mais que coelhos te atacam na surdina. Tudo isso com a ajuda de uma guria que TALVEZ tenha uma queda por você (tá caidinha), um robô maluco que pensa que é cachorro, um velho perneta, uma ex-cientista (caidinha pelo velho perneta) e um ex-segurança meio caipira que, particularmente, não vou muito com a cara.

10/10

Half-Life 2 must be one of the best video game sequels ever made, if not the best of all.

Raising the bar as Gordon Freeman once again, this game has no shortage of action, great characters and vents. The gameplay is great, it's really rewarding once you single handedly kill a group of Combine soldiers with nothing but sheer will to live as you frantically run about and switch weapons constantly. There are more trickier enemies to deal with, but you find out the best tactics to take them out soon enough. Getting the upgrade for the Gravity Gun is just as satisfying as getting the BFG-9000 in DOOM.

The graphics are stunning for 2004, alongside Far Cry, which also came out that year. The new physics engine is really put to show with puzzles, interactive objects and more. The soundtrack is without a doubt one of the best and most recognizable in gaming, with a mix of both new and old tracks.

The modding community is still around, with a lot of mods to play around with, one of the most iconic ones being Garry's Mod, which is now an official game on Steam.

10/10, an amazing sci-fi adventure with tons of replayability.

16년된 게임치고 상당히 디테일이 있습니다.
요즘 FPS의 액션을 찾을수는 없지만, 오히려 지금 fps에 없는 치밀한 맵디자인과 무기활용의 자율성을 확실히 챙겼다는 점에서 오히려 신선한 FPS게임 같았습니다. 몇몇 요소는 포탈의 퍼즐 요소를 가졌습니다. 이 요소를 활용해 포탈이라는 새로운 모드, 게임이 나올 수 있었던 거겠죠?
재미보다는 게임의 교과서를 플레이해본다는 호기심(?)으로 시작했는데 생각보다 낡은 게임이 아니라서 놀랐네요.
